2025-0804
2025-11-13TB, INFCConflict of Interest ActAppointment of the public office holder (1) for the purpose of paragraph (e) of the definition public office holder in subsection 2‍(1) of the Conflict of Interest Act; and (2 )as a reporting public office holder for the purpose of paragraph (f) of the definition reporting public office holder in subsection 2‍(1) of that Act.Order designating Ehren Cory, Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Infrastructure Bank, as a reporting public office holder (1) for the purpose of paragraph (e) of the definition public office holder in subsection 2‍(1) of that Act, and (2) as a reporting public office holder for the purpose of paragraph (f) of the definition reporting public office holder in subsection 2‍(1) of that Act.N/A
subject: Appointment of the public office holder (1) for the purpose of paragraph (e) of the definition public office holder in subsection 2‍(1) of the Conflict of Interest Act; and (2 )as a reporting public office holder for the purpose of paragraph (f) of the definition reporting public office holder in subsection 2‍(1) of that Act.
precis: Order designating Ehren Cory, Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Infrastructure Bank, as a reporting public office holder (1) for the purpose of paragraph (e) of the definition public office holder in subsection 2‍(1) of that Act, and (2) as a reporting public office holder for the purpose of paragraph (f) of the definition reporting public office holder in subsection 2‍(1) of that Act.
